          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Structural isomers of C<3>H<7>Br</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strukturelle Isomere von C<3>H<7>Br</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Isomères structuraux de C<3>H<7>Br</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isomers estruturais de C<3>H<7>Br</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Isomeri strutturali di C<3>H<7>Br</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομικά ισομερή C<3>H<7>Br</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Isómeros estructurales de C<3>H<7>Br</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the skeletal formulae of the structural isomers 1-bromopropane and 2-bromopropane. Both have the molecular formula C<3>H<7>Br.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">1-bromopropane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">2-bromopropane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">skeletal formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">structural isomers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die skelettartigen Formeln 
der strukturellen Isomere 1-bromopropane und 2-bromopropane. 
Beide haben die molekulare Formel C<3>H<7>Br.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les formules 
squelettiques des isomères structuraux 1-bromopropane et 
2-bromopropane. Tous les deux ont la formule moléculaire 
C<3>H<7>Br.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as fórmulas esqueletais
dos isomers estruturais 1-bromopropane e 2-bromopropane. Ambos 
têm a fórmula molecular C<3>H<7>Br.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le formule 
scheletriche degli isomeri strutturali 1-bromopropane e 
2-bromopropane. Entrambi hanno la formula molecolare C<3>H<7>Br.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σκελετικούς τύπους του 
δομικών 1-ψρομοπροπανε και του 2-ψρομοπροπανε ισομερών. Και οι
δύο έχουν το μοριακό τύπο C<3>H<7>Br.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los fórmulas 
esqueléticos de los isómeros estructurales 1-bromopropane y 
2-bromopropane. Ambos tienen el fórmula molecular C<3>H<7>Br.</string>
          </description>
